name: Nest Preschool
description: Students will be eligible to enroll in The Nest when they turn 2 years and 9 months of age, provided they are completely potty trained.
fullDescription: Students will be eligible to enroll in The Nest when they turn 2 years and 9 months of age, provided they are completely potty trained.
whatTheyOffer: Students will be eligible to enroll in The Nest when they turn 2 years and 9 months of age, provided they are completely potty trained.
howToGetIt: Begin by scheduling a campus tour here For a detailed overview of the admissions process visit here.
cost: This is a fee based service.
